item.title: HTTPX is the new Requests with Async
item.description: Long live requests welcome HTTPX HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2. Far and away, requests stands as the most notable third party package. It’s almost considered part of what makes up python these days. Unfortunately, little forward progress has been made in recent times to incorporate python’s async capabilities. This is where HTTPX is stepping up to the plate.
